summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 4268 for the improvement of Lane Street, from 5th Avenue South to 7th Avenue South; and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues, by the construction of concrete and wooden sidewalks and trestles and otherwise improving the same; under Ordinance No. 50714, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
